sentences.en: Don't drop your cigarette ash on the carpet, use an ashtray.
sentences.cn: 不要把烟灰都落在地毯上, 用烟灰缸.

sentences.en: Drop your cigarette ashes into the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 请把香烟灰弹在烟灰缸里.

sentences.en: He crushed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他在烟灰缸里弄熄了香烟.

sentences.en: He flicked ash into the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他把烟灰弹到烟灰缸里.

sentences.en: He knocked out his pipe in the big glass ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他在大玻璃烟灰缸里磕净烟斗.

sentences.en: He stubbed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他在烟灰缸内捻灭了他的香烟。

sentences.en: He watched his cigarette die in the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他看着他的烟在烟灰缸里熄灭.

sentences.en: Here , let me get you an ashtray.
I emptied the sweet wrappers from the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 我把烟灰缸里的糖纸倒掉。

sentences.en: I ground my cigarette into the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 我把香烟掐灭后扔入烟灰缸。

sentences.en: Main product: Wine class 、 Drinking glass 、 Candlestick 、 Ashtray 、 Perfume Bottle 、 Fruit 、 Fruit tray 、 Vase 、 And so on.
sentences.cn: 主要产品: 酒杯、水杯、烛台、烟缸、香水瓶、水果、果盘、花瓶等.

sentences.en: She hurled the ashtray across the room, narrowly missing my head.
sentences.cn: 她用力把烟灰缸从房间那头扔过来，差点砸到我的脑袋。

sentences.en: She threw the cigarette butt into the ashtray.
The ashtray and sound button are in the armrest.
sentences.cn: 烟灰缸和音乐按钮均设在椅子扶手上.

sentences.en: The table is covered with dirty plate and the ashtray is full.
sentences.cn: 餐桌上杯盘狼藉,烟缸里堆满烟灰.

sentences.en: The table is covered with dirty plates and the ashtray is full.
sentences.cn: 餐桌上杯盘狼籍,烟缸里堆满烟灰.

trans.tran_en: a small dish where you put used cigarettes
